result.execSummary:
The defendant David L. KOMOROSKY was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Battery-use of dangerous weapon [Modifiers: Use Dangerous Weapon (Misdemeanor)], a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 940.19(1).
  • Carry Concealed Weapon, a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 941.23(2).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

miscConds.notes: Maintain fulltime employment, schooling or a combination of both.

Pay supervision fees in an amount to be determined by the Department of Corrections.

Submit to random urine screens and pay for same.

Assessment, treatment, counseling as deemed appropriate by the Department's assessment process.

Provide DNA sample.

No contact with Damien or Percy Watkins.

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. David L. KOMOROSKY

ADDRESS INFO for David L. KOMOROSKY
Current: 2000 Johnston Drive #20, Manitowoc, WI 54220 United States  (Effective: 11-26-2015)
Prior: Manitowoc County Jail, Manitowoc, WI 54220

Defendant demands a preliminary hearing.   Preliminary hearing is set for 12-09-15 at 9:30 a.m.    
Minutes.

$1,000.00 cash bail furnished and defendant is released from custody.    
Notice to Party Furnishing Cash Bail Bond.

BAIL HEARING - 
Defendant in custody and appearing by video from the Manitowoc County Jail.  The State informs the Court that the defendant will be charged with the crimes of reckless endangering safety and carry concealed weapon.  The matters are continued for initial appearance on 11-30-15 at 2:30 p.m.  Bail is set at $1,000.00 cash with the conditions that he report to the Manitowoc City Police Department for fingerprints, photographs and other identifying information within 24 hours of release, have no contact with Lashawn Owens, Damen Watkins and Percy Watkins, provide DNA sample and no possession of any firearms.  Bail not furnished and defendant is remanded into custody.  Commitment for failure to furnish bail issued.  Copy filed.
Minutes.
RE:  Lashawn Owens, on 11-23-15.
